Key Match Events: Santi Aldama scored 27 points and hit five 3-pointers
Ja Morant tallied 22 points, 10 assists and 5 rebounds
Lauri Markkanen scored a game-high 35 points and added 9 rebounds
Walker Kessler had 16 points, 14 rebounds and 5 blocked shots
Miscellaneous Highlights: Memphis turned 17 turnovers by the Jazz into 24 points
Others: The game was Utah Jazz vs Memphis Grizzlies NBA season opener
The game was played at Delta Center
The final score was 126-124 in favor of the Memphis Grizzlies
